definition: the back of a body or object/to turn one's back/to hide something from/to learn by heart/to recite from memory/unlucky (slang)/hard of hearing
to be burdened/to carry on the back or shoulder

sentences.english: The south area of Zhaoyuan is situated at between terrace Chaoyanggou and anticlinal belt Changchunling.
sentences.chinese: 肇源南地區位於朝陽溝階地和長春嶺背斜帶之間。

sentences.english: There are favorable condition for formation of non anticlinal oil & gas pools in the Tarim Basin.
sentences.chinese: 塔里木盆地具備發育非背斜圈閉油氣藏的條件。

sentences.english: Anticlines are arch-shaped folds in which rock layers are upwardly convex.
sentences.chinese: 典型地背斜是岩層向上凸起的褶曲。

sentences.english: Thirdly, the reverse tectonic activities produced numerous small anticlines during the late period of the Minghuazhen Formation developing.
sentences.chinese: 明化鎮組晚期反轉構造形成了衆多的小背斜。

sentences.english: Middle the Kang Yunnan earth axis sticks out for the anteklise, big area appearing platform basis.
sentences.chinese: 康滇地軸中部爲臺背斜隆起，大面積出露地臺基底。

sentences.english: Three anticline zones developed on the south margins of Junggar Basin.
sentences.chinese: 準噶爾盆地南緣發育三排背斜帶。

sentences.english: The following conclusions are gained:1. The main reason of ChangJi anticline form is the wedging of triangle zone.
sentences.chinese: 昌吉背斜是因爲三角構造楔的楔入而生成的褶皺背斜。

sentences.english: The following conclusions are gained:1. The main reason of ChangJi anticline form is the wedging of triangle zone.
sentences.chinese: 昌吉背斜是因爲三角構造楔的楔入而生成的褶皺背斜。

sentences.english: The mining area is situated at the northeast wing of Xian'ebaodan Anticline.
sentences.chinese: 礦區位於仙鵝抱蛋背斜的東北翼。

sentences.english: Now, use your compasses to measure the attitude of the two limbs of the anticline.
sentences.chinese: 現在用你們的羅盤去測量一下那個背斜兩翼的產狀。

sentences.english: Gushan anticline is the main controlling structure in Fengfeng mine district.
sentences.chinese: 鼓山背斜是峯峯礦區的主控構造。

sentences.english: Tangxinzhai gold deposit is located in the northwest part of Laizishan anticline.
sentences.chinese: 塘新寨金礦位於賴子山背斜北西端。

sentences.english: Aimed at the structural characteristics of Baobei anticline, the model of lifting structure is established.
sentences.chinese: 針對寶北背斜構造特點，提出了衝起構造模式。

sentences.english: An anticlinal fold with a columnar salt plug at its core.
sentences.chinese: 背斜的岩石皺褶，核心部有柱狀鹽填充。

sentences.english: Folds typically occur in anticline-syncline pairs.
sentences.chinese: 背斜與向斜典型地成對產出。

sentences.english: The most common structural targets associated with oil entrapment are anticlines and faults.
sentences.chinese: 與儲油圈閉有關的最一般的構造目標是背斜和斷層。

definition: reverse fault (geology)/compression fault, where one block pushes over the other at dip of less than 45 degrees
Silurian system (geology)/see 志留紀|志留纪
variant of 岩層|岩层[yan2 ceng2]/rock strata
